department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.en: This course covers the principles of radio communication systems with emphasis on digital radio communication techniques and is the extension of SS4019. An hour of the course is allocated for lab sessions. Through the hands-on experiences, students will gain better understanding toward the material taught in the lectures.
goal.ch: 修課的學生於學期末能夠針對有限的條件設計出一套基礎的通訊系統，並能指出一個通訊系統的利弊。

content.en: The course begins with a review of radio communication systems and techniques, including some basic communication system theory and its applications to linear systems. The factors that lead to the development of link budgets will be covered in detail - radio wave propagation, antennas, noise temperature, and radio transmitters and receivers. A review of digital radio communications techniques will follow, covering source coding and coding for error control, modulation methods, and bit error rates. Spread spectrum system will be covered with emphasis on GPS. Applications of these techniques will be illustrated with examples from broadcast, satellite, and terrestrial radio systems.
content.ch: 此門課將承接SS4019所學，基於無線電通訊理論，學習數位通訊系統、探討無線電通訊的應用。此門課首先概括地從其原理到應用，介紹無線電通訊系統和技術。鏈路預算的每一個環節，從無線電傳播、天線、噪音、無線電發送與接收器，也會逐步說明。通訊技術和寬頻技術的應用，會藉由地面和衛星通訊的例子得到闡述。每星期有一個小時的實驗課，讓學生透過實驗、親手操作或架構通訊系統中接收器元件，應用課程所學。
